name: User can use the Price filter in order to filter products with prices -- @1.2

steps.name: When User sets the price filter to 1000 dollars and 1500 dollars using the slide bar

When Click on X from the maximum price filter to remove it
Then Verify maximum price filter slider handle position resents
Then Verify the Price filter worked
